name: Non-human Seeking Free Wobbling
description:
- - - - - - - - - - - STORY - - - - - - - - - - -

You are a scientist at the renowned Highly Kabbalistic Cthulhu Science Center. Your task is simple: study an Azagoth sample, harvested at the low price of many of your collegues lives, in a controlled environnement.

- - - - - - - - - - - CONTROLS - - - - - - - - - - -

> The game is playable with the mouse <

> Click on the monster to make it react <

> Drag is also possible <

- - - - - - - - - - - TEAM - - - - - - - - - - -

Horace RIBOUT "Horace" (Dev)

Simon Feugeas "Linkouille" (Dev)

Louis Varon "Sothar" (Artist)

Simon Jourdan "DigiCookie" (itch.io page)

Guillaume d’ARCY-ORGA "Choucroute' (Sound Designer and Music)
